Uses of Package
controller

Packages that use controller
Package
Description
controller
 
  • Classes in controller used by controller
    Class
    Description
    AddToy
    The AddToy class represents the functionality to add a new toy to the ToyList.
    RemoveToy
    The RemoveToy class provides methods to remove a toy from a toy list.
    SearchBuyToy
    The SearchBuyToy class represents a class that allows the user to search for and purchase toys from a ToyList.
    ToyList
    A class that represents a list of toys that can be saved to and loaded from a file.
    ValidateInput
    The ValidateInput class provides methods to validate and ensure user input is valid for various properties such as serial number, stock, age, classification, size, and type.
